summary: Hey there! I'm Jacob Davis, a jack-of-all-trades as a freelance engineer, production associate, and all-around maker. I've dabbled in some college with a focus on mechanical engineering, but my real passion lies in solving problems, tinkering on projects, gaming, and constantly learning new things. Whether I'm optimizing production workflows, getting hands-on with making cool stuff, or teaming up with others, I'm always up for a challenge. Let's connect and create something awesome together!
